title: How to Keep a Child Entertained (and Other Impossibilities)
description:
Today on the show we're answering a long-requested question: What sorts of games do you play with kids? The Besties weigh in on some of their chosen diversions. 

Games discussed include: Monster Legends, ABCYa/ABCMouse/PBSkids, Sonic the Hedgehog 2, Super Mario Odyssey, Kirby and the Forgotten World, Roblox, The Room, Humongous Games, and Chuchel.
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (Justin McElroy, Griffin McElroy, Chris Plante, Russ Frushtick)
